name: MICROSIMULACION Flight Center
about: At MICROSIMULACION Flight Center, we are dedicated to providing high-quality, personalized flight training tailored to each student's unique needs. Located in a premier flight training environment, our school offers a wide range of certifications, including private pilot, instrument rating, commercial, multi-engine, and instructor training. Our staff consists of experienced, multilingual instructors who use real-world, scenario-based training to ensure fun and effective learning. We maintain a fleet of well-maintained, safety-inspected aircraft and utilize advanced simulator technology to enhance training. With a focus on safety, community, and adventure, we strive to create safe, competent pilots and provide a seamless path to a career in aviation. Join us to achieve your aviation goals in a supportive and professional environment.
